RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 7F Turf CR: 73. Allowance Purse 18800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 4 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility). (If necessary will be run SIX FURLONGS Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TIMELY SECRET bid clear into the far turn drawing off in upper stretch holding sway to wire. PINK CHANNEL stalked the pace chasing on the far turn being dispatched in upper stretch continuing on a willing second best. MADY ROSE went evenly swinging out nine wide in upper stretch giving a mild rally to pass the others. SEMIRAMIS a step slow early raced evenly to upper stretch gaining then holding spot late. OUT FOR MYSELF stalked the pace moving evenly to upper stretch tiring late. VINTAGE bore out on the first turn racing wide after. IRON BERTIE rushed hard at the break drifted wide on the first turn. BAY OF ANGELS varied little playing no factor. HOPS PETUNIA bore out on the first turn rushing on the backside giving way on the far turn. YAZZERA (PER) was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Pink Channel
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, chased far turn, dispatched top lane second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Out for Myself
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked early, evenly to lane, tired late

ENTRY.NAME: Yazzera (PER)
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Vintage
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore out first turn, wide trip

ENTRY.NAME: Semiramis
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, evenly to lane, held spot lane

ENTRY.NAME: Timely Secret
ENTRY.COMMENT: bid clear to far turn, drew off top lane, held sway

ENTRY.NAME: Bay of Angels
ENTRY.COMMENT: varied little, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Hops Petunia
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore out first turn, rusged backside, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Mady Rose
ENTRY.OWNER: O'Sullivan Farms LLC and Dunloe Ventures LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, swung 9 wide lane, outfinished others

ENTRY.NAME: Iron Bertie
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed break, drifted wide first turn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 1M Turf CR: 69. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (If necessary will be run SAME DISTANCE Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MILLIONDOLARMONKEY well rated rushed hard along the inside on the far turn shaking clear in upper stretch angling out mid stretch drifting wide in the final yards. BAYTOWN BEAVER rushed clear early turned away challenger into the the far turn then ceded while drifting out into upper stretch continuing to bear wide late ending in the twelve path staying on to the wire. FOGGY ALBION raced evenly moving along the inside down the lane finishing well. SHANNONRUN hustled close up was rebuffed to the far turn then bore out into upper stretch bidding evenly the final eighth. B G LEE tracked early then was shuffled back along the inside on the far turn regaining some position from the rail down the lane. FINLANDIAS NEAT wide early raced evenly through the lane. SCREAMING JEREMY played no factor. HICKORY BILL gave early retreat.

ENTRY.NAME: B G Lee
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked early, shuffled back turn, rail lane

ENTRY.NAME: Shannonrun
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled close up tried leader 1/2, resbuffed, bore out top lane

ENTRY.NAME: Milliondolarmonkey
ENTRY.COMMENT: well rated, surged inside 1/4, clear lane, drifted wide

ENTRY.NAME: Baytown Beaver
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed clear, rebuffed challenge, bore out lane, stayed on

ENTRY.NAME: Hickory Bill
ENTRY.COMMENT: gave early retreat

ENTRY.NAME: Screaming Jeremy
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Finlandias Neat
ENTRY.COMMENT: wide early, evenly lane

ENTRY.NAME: Foggy Albion
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, inside to lane, finished well

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 1M Turf CR: 60. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (If necessary will be run SAME DISTANCE Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NORTHERN TICK TOCK passed on the backside sat patient vying three deep in upper stretch winning clear. ZINFATUATION stalked the pace while saving ground to upper stretch vying along the rail proving no match for the winner while saving place. MOBOT slow early gained on the far turn angling wide in upper stretch pressing to the wire. MACHO CASH raced evenly moving from mid track down the lane lacking punch. SPY TOWN hustled along cleared on the backside then was hooked between horses to upper stretch giving way there. KNOCKOUT GUY hustled along through the far turn faded wide into upper stretch. WHY WINCHILL WHY was always outrun. BLACK BULL was steadied on the first turn giving a wide middle move flattening out on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Northern Tick Tock
ENTRY.COMMENT: passed backside, sat patient, bid three deep lane, went clear

ENTRY.NAME: Macho Cash
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, 5 wide lane, lacked punch

ENTRY.NAME: Black Bull
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied first turn, middle move, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Spy Town
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, cleared backside, between to lane, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Zinfatuation
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, saved ground, vied rail top lane, saved second

ENTRY.NAME: Mobot
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, gained far turn, angled wide lane

ENTRY.NAME: Why Winchill Why
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Knockout Guy
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, faded wide lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 5F Dirt CR: 63. Claiming Purse 7800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 4 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PAYNT THE KITTY slow early saved ground to upper stretch finding a late burst along the rail winning clear. HOT TAKE sent clear set the pace digging in to upper stretch angling out a bit late ceding to rail pressure. LUNAR PRAYER pressed the pace extending to upper stretch weakening a bit late. SPICEY SECRET was always a step slow. THATS ALL SHEWROTE chased through the turn wearing down in upper stretch. MY BRIDGET VERDOT raced five wide to upper stretch tiring there. SPEEDY FIRE was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Hot Take
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, set pace, dug in lane, angled out, overpowered

ENTRY.NAME: Spicey Secret
ENTRY.OWNER: Clemmer, Sheryl R. and Bachis, Taryn L.
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Paynt the Kitty
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, saved ground to lane, late rush on rail, in time

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Amy Bayle, Allen Racing LLC & Robyn Theobald

ENTRY.NAME: Speedy Fire
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Lunar Prayer
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, extended to lane, weakened a bit late

ENTRY.NAME: Thats All Shewrote
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: My Bridget Verdot
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5 wide tired lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE DECEMBER 4, 2022. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BALTIC FLEET pressured the pace through the turb bearing down abreast rival in upper stretch edging clear late. ARAZI LIKE MOVE gave a mild move on the turn vying from mid track down the lane coming on late as second best. QUICK ENTRY hustled out was pressured to keep a narrow lead through the turn into upper stretch wearing down late. TOMMY TUESDAY slow early lost ground to upper stretch passing a couple there while six wide. KITCHI faded along the rail. UNION BROTHER chased the pace through the turn tiring in the four path down the lane. VAN DAMME trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Quick Entry
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled out, pressed on a short lead, dug in to lane, wore down

ENTRY.NAME: Baltic Fleet
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, bore down abreast foe lane, went clear

ENTRY.NAME: Kitchi
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded along the rail

ENTRY.NAME: Union Brother
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, tired 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Tommy Tuesday
ENTRY.OWNER: Gray Christopher L and Gray Melissa R
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, outrun to lane, minor improvement 6 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Van Damme
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Arazi Like Move
ENTRY.COMMENT: mild move turn, 5 wide lane, came on for place

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 8700. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE DECEMBER 4, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 4 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In El igibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HOT CAROL sent clear set the pace widening into upper stretch pouring it on late as the much the best. SILVER STICK STAIR slow early rallied to upper stretch splitting horses late saving place. SWEET BELEN saved ground vying from the inside down the lane being outfinished. MS HEADLEY chased the pace vying three deep in upper stretch weakening late. PETAL was always outrun. DANCING DESTINY breaking slowly was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Belen
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, vied inside lane, out finished

ENTRY.NAME: Petal
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Silver Stick Stair
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, split horses mid stretch, saved place

ENTRY.NAME: Hot Carol
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, widened into lane, much the best

ENTRY.NAME: Dancing Destiny
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slowly, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Ms Headley
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, three deep lane, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 94. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 21200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $15,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since M ay 4 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HOBE SOUND gave a prompted middle move chasing on the far turn saving ground to wrest a short lead in upper stretch digging in gamely late to prevail. DARK OAK set the pace being hooked on the far turn then headed from the inside in upper stretch battling back to be right there at the wire. HIGH ROLLING DUDE off slowly would lag early responding outside on the far turn losing ground to upper stretch vying willingly late while seven wide. ESCAPE VELOCITY stalked the pace chasing on the far turn ceding while wide to upper stretch regrouping to close some late in the six path. PEACE OF EKATI slow early gave a mild rally on the far turn vying from the inside down the lane needing more at the end. BLOOD MOON stalked the pace pressing in bid at the quarter pole weakening in upper stretch. TAMANRASSETT outrun early would tire.

ENTRY.NAME: Hobe Sound
ENTRY.OWNER: Baird, John W. and Harbison, Rex
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, chased far turn, led inside lane, up gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: Tamanrassett
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun early, tired,

ENTRY.NAME: High Rolling Dude
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, lagged early, outside move far turn, vied willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Dark Oak
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, hooked far turn, headed lane, battled back

ENTRY.NAME: Escape Velocity
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, chased far turn, 6 wide lane, gained some late

ENTRY.NAME: Blood Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, pressed far turn, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Peace of Ekati
ENTRY.OWNER: Tijuana Racing Stables Tenenbaum Jeffrey and Bloom Jeffrey
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, mild rally far turn, vied inside lane, needed more

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 9400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 4 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PERFECT PICTURE away alertly set the pace being pressed from the inside in upper stretch then engaged from the outside late hanging on gamely. PAPA CHARLES slow early circled out to upper stretch surging to vie gamely seven wide late. CHOPPED chased the pace rallying on the inside to duel in upper stretch coming up a bit short late. FROSTED WHITE FACE chased the pace extending from mid track down the lane hanging late. EASY STRIDE vied on the turn then weakened in upper stretch. RICKI TORNADO gave way on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Perfect Picture
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, pressed from inside lane, dug in late

ENTRY.NAME: Papa Charles
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, circled out to lane, vied gamely late 7 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Ricki Tornado
ENTRY.COMMENT: gave way on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Chopped
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, pressed inside to lane, dueled, bit short

ENTRY.NAME: Easy Stride
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied on the turn, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Frosted White Face
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, extended mid track lane, hung,
